attributes.action: Demand that Clarence Mitchell Retracts Statement Inferring Birtish Parents Negelct Their Child
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In a recent interview, Clarence Mitchell implied that it is the norm for British parents to neglect their children, ie put them to bed and leave them alone. The interview is can be heard on the Primetime programme dated 27th October 2007. As it is not permitted to give a link, search for Irish news network  
I don't know anyone who leaves their children unattended to go out socialising and bitterly resent the slur cast upon the majority of CARING,RESPONSIBLE parents.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
